meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Community Police Oversight Board

agenda_items.title: Call To Order & Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Mark Davidson will call the meeting to order and conduct a roll call.

agenda_items.title: Purpose of the CPOB
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Mark Davidson will explain the purpose of the Community Police Oversight Board.

agenda_items.title: Public Comment / Open Microphone
agenda_items.description: Open microphone period for public comments, limited to three minutes per person.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the December 10, 2024, CPOB Regular Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Overview of Information and Technology Services
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the services offered by the Department of Information Technology to CPOB members.

agenda_items.title: Introduction of Interim Chief
agenda_items.description: Introduction of Dallas Police Department Interim Chief Michael Igo to the CPOB.

agenda_items.title: Presentation on Racial Disparity in DPD Monthly Arrests
agenda_items.description: Bob Scales will present on racial disparity issues in DPD monthly arrests by council district.

agenda_items.title: OCPO Accountability and Transparency Dashboard Presentation
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the Transparency & Accountability Dashboard developed by DBI and OCPO.

agenda_items.title: Introduction of New OCPO Staff
agenda_items.description: Introduction of new staff members Waldir Guerrero and Alma D. Perez.

agenda_items.title: Reports / Briefings
agenda_items.description: Various reports from the Director, Policy Analyst, and Special Investigator.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Activity Reports
agenda_items.description: Reports on DPD monthly arrests and external administrative complaints.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Meeting and Events
agenda_items.description: Discussion of upcoming events and meetings.

agenda_items.title: Public Comment/Open Microphone
agenda_items.description: Second opportunity for public comments, limited to three minutes per person.
